What We Offer


	Exposure to enterprise-level backend projects across industries.
	Remote work flexibility.
	Growth into fullstack or AI engineering paths.
	Supportive, innovative, and growth-focused culture.


Method of Application

Backend Developer Job at Crescita Solutions




        
    

        
        Crescita Solutions is a results-focused digital marketing agency in Nigeria & Ghana, helping brands, creators, and organizations achieve measurable growth through data-driven campaigns, high-impact branding, and cutting-edge web technologies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Backend Developer
Job Location: Lagos

Role Overview
     

            
    




	As a Backend Developer, you will design, build, and maintain powerful backend systems using Python frameworks (Django, FastAPI, Flask) and JavaScript (Node.js, Express).
	You’ll work closely with frontend and mobile teams to deliver seamless applications for diverse industries.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, maintain, and optimize APIs and backend systems.
	Work with databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB.
	Ensure data integrity, security, and high-performance scaling.
	Collaborate with frontend and mobile teams to integrate APIs.
	Write reusable, scalable , and efficient backend code.
	Troubleshoot and debug backend issues quickly.


Requirements & Skills


	Proficiency in Python (Django, FastAPI, Flask) or JavaScript (Node.js, Express).
	Strong knowledge of databases (SQL & NoSQL).
	Experience with REST APIs, GraphQL is a plus.
	Understanding of cloud hosting (AWS, Azure, GCP) is an advantage.
	Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
	Version control experience with Git/GitHub.


What We Offer


	Exposure to enterprise-level backend projects across industries.
	Remote work flexibility.
	Growth into fullstack or AI engineering paths.
	Supportive, innovative, and growth-focused culture.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Portfolio to: careers@crescitas.com using “Backend Developer – Crescita Solutions” as the subject of the email.

Teller Job at Citibank Nigeria Limited (CNL)




        
    

        
        Citibank Nigeria Limited (CNL) was incorporated in Nigeria on May 2, 1984 and the oldest international bank in the country. It provides a wide range of financial products and services to corporate and commercial customers, financial institutions and public sector organizations. It offers deposit and loan products, global transaction services, cash management, sales and trading, corporate finance and investment banking products.

We are recruiting to fill the position beloww:

Job Position: Teller

Job Req ID: 25895611
Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

Job Overview
     

            
    




	The Teller is responsible for processing basic to relatively complex transfers in coordination with the Transaction Services team.
	The overall objective is to perform moderately complex cash & trade operation tasks, by providing processing assistance for assigned projects


Responsibilities


	Perform cash management operations, such as cash handling, check processing, return items and lock-box operations
	Provide processing assistance for firm payments, receivables, trade transactions, liquidity flows and wholesale card activity
	Aid with processing firm payments, receivables, trade transactions, liquidity flows and wholesale card activity
	Serve as a subject matter expert for User Acceptance Training (UAT) and training initiatives; train new team members and lower level personnel
	Participate in compliance related activities to minimize losses
	Assist with cash & trade operational project needs
	Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.


Requirements
Qualifications:


	2-4 years of relevant experience
	Demonstrated basic experience in cash management processing and transaction services
	Proficiency with Microsoft Office tools and data entry skills


Education:


	High School diploma or equivalent

Business Development Manager Job at Green Africa Airways Limited




        
    

        
        Green Africa Airways Limited is a value airline based in Lagos, Nigeria. We are a new carrier that offers safe, reliable and affordable air travel to a much broader group of customers. This positions us as a significant contributor to the economic development of Nigeria and the African continent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Job Tye: Full-time (On-site)
Job function: Commercial Studios

Job Role
     

            
    




	Research and identify new business opportunities, including new markets, growth areas, customer segments, and strategic partnerships.
	Develop and maintain strong relationships with new and existing clients, partners, and stakeholders to drive business growth.
	Lead strategic planning initiatives to enhance the company’s market presence and operational performance.
	Develop and implement sales plan, strategies, and initiatives to generate new business opportunities as well as expand current clients
	Collaborate with the Legal team to draft, review, and finalize contracts and business proposals before submission to prospective clients.
	Analyzing and identifying the scope for business case analysis and recommend solutions and improvements to business procedures
	Partner with the Marketing department to design and execute promotional strategies and campaigns.
	Maintain a deep understanding of company products, services, and value proposition to effectively engage clients and partners.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field
	5–10 years of progressive experience in Sales, Business Development, or a related field (aviation industry experience is a strong advantage).
	Proven ability to identify, develop, and manage strategic business opportunities and partnerships.
	Strong interpersonal and relationship management skills, with the ability to engage effectively with board members, colleagues, business partners, prospects, and community stakeholders.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Outlook).
	Demonstrated ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage multiple clients/projects effectively.
	Exceptional time management and organizational skills
